Issue.creator: burdettadam
Issue.summary: Community PR: move Endpoint to API because type safety
Issue.description: Signed-off-by: Axel Nennker <axel.nennker@telekom.de>- enhance type safety- easier to read api for api usersIn the future add endpoint validity checks to Endpoint::new so the code fails early if an invalide endpoint is passed into the Indy api
